website_summaries.verdict: A no-brainer for someone looking to produce large amounts of orange or grapefruit juice.
pros: We loved the size of this juicer
It was smaller than most models so you would be able to leave it on the counter for daily use
This specific juicer is used for citrus fruits and it works quickly
It juices an orange in about 10 seconds
There is only one speed, but it's powerful
Despite its power, it runs quietly
cons: Sits at a significantly higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: wow,wow,wow
customer_reviews.text: if your tired of jucers that dont work than you need to buy this one, the old saying (you get what you pay for) is true you pay a little more buy u will never have to buy another one, i use this at my home and all i can say is (wow)
customer_reviews.author: les Davidson

customer_reviews.title: A beast - simple, functional and very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly simple and functional piece of equipment, will make you want to upgrade your kitchen to meet such high standard of simplicity and sturdiness. The only imperfection we found is that the metal bowl slides due to immense torque. Easily fixed as shown here:
customer_reviews.author: Laurent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect orange juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is spectacular! It pushes the juice out of the orange halves super fast and efficiently. Cleanup is fast as there are only four parts to clean in total. Using this is a pure joy.
customer_reviews.author: George Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Work horse.
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily in our high volume cocktail bar, we’ve had one for almost 6 years and it’s still going strong. We squeeze between 30-100lbs of citrus every day. It’s quite enough for hone use if you have the space for it. Great juicer, I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: brent sexton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent citrus juicer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, works like a champ, we use it every day in our cafe and it is a workhorse - very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's the best you can get because it lasts forever, even in a commercial environment.
customer_reviews.author: j. kent thurston

customer_reviews.title: Very robust juicer-may be too much for some
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Hamilton Beach electric juicer. It is an extremely well built, robust piece of kitchen equipment that literally whizzes through any citrus fruit thrown its way.That siad it can be a little intimidationg as this machine only has one speed and that is full bore which can be a little more than is needed for the casual user.
customer_reviews.author: REB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in terms of speed (cannot be faster)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in terms of speed (cannot be faster), but some training is needed for home because it is very fast, and juice gets much pulp: fine if you like it but bad if you need to filter it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: realy nice
customer_reviews.text: i really like it. it is make to the last... is easy to clean and you get a orange juice faster and easy... we can saw the power full motor and is really silent while is waiting for put a new orange..... I really love fresh made orange juice...
customer_reviews.author: Darshan

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product compare to similar ones .... it’s powerfull I like it all
customer_reviews.author: Hakan

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: This this is a tank!! If you have enough use for it, I'd say make the investment
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. Would be nice if the price was a little more affordable
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Commercial Grade
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is what I use in my restaurant. It is high powered and very easy to use. Cleaning and maintaining the machine are very easy. The only reason I am not giving it a 5 star rating is because I would like for the strainer to take more of the pulp out. Besides that, it is a quality juicer that is perfect for a commercial evironment.
customer_reviews.author: Seoul Food

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Citrus Juicer.
customer_reviews.text: very good product, makes juicing oranges and grapefruit almost effortless. it is everything i expected and i hope to have many years of great use.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We are a restaurant. We are using "the heck out of it" and it hasn't broken down on us. 10 gallons of line juice every 3 days or so.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Too 'flimsy'
customer_reviews.text: It's too 'flimsy' The cone is not well designed. The citrus fruit 'comes off' during juicing and the cone 'bites' your hand. Spend more... and get the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Really Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is one powerful juicer and is solidly built. This a commercial juicer but I bought it for home use. I browsed the reviews of other juicers here on Amazon and found alot of mixed reviews. This one stood out because other reviews said it was a really good commercial juicer and it was half off. I would be very surprised if it gave me any mechanical problems any time soon because it looks acts like a strong and well built piece of machinery.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My wife used it with mixed feelings, but I thought it was excellent. I juiced 26 large oranges in ~30 minutes, including cleanup, making over a gallon of orange juice. It's fast and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Real commercial grade juicer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bene using it for a month now in a cafe, every day, and it works great. Solid, fast, quiet and reliable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Best Around
customer_reviews.text: If you love squeezing fresh oranges and you are fed up with all the littly crappy juicers on the market, then this product is for you. Just be careful, its so effective you might not want to let a kid play with this.....easy to clean and very effective.......
customer_reviews.author: Norman E. Kent

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Commercial HCJ967 High Output Electric Citrus Juicer, Brushless Motor, NSF Approved
product_meta.description: Color:HCJ967Introducing the HCJ967 from Hamilton Beach Commercial. This is a new and improved version of the now discontinued 96700 electric citrus juicer.
feature_bullets: Modified reamers for optimum juice yield. Maximum juice, minimum effort. NSF Approved.
High-capacity stainless steel juice bowl with stabilizing collar
3 reamer sizes extract maximum juice from small to large citrus
Extra-tall spout and crescent footprint make room for glasses and pitchers
Entire top section is removable for dishwasher safe cleaning
